caption: A retro disco track with four-on-the-floor beat, lush string arrangements, and sparkling female vocals. Features funky rhythm guitar, groovy bass lines, and shimmering synth pads that capture the glamour of the 70s dance floor.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Mirror ball is spinning round
Silver lights upon the ground
Put your platforms on tonight
We're gonna dance until the light

[Pre-Chorus]
The music's calling out your name
Nothing's ever gonna be the same

[Chorus]
Disco fever in my soul
Let the rhythm take control
Dancing queen under the lights
We're gonna boogie all night
Boogie all night

[Verse 2]
Sequin dress and golden chains
Forget about your daily pains
On this floor we're all the same
Lost inside this disco flame

[Chorus]
Disco fever in my soul
Let the rhythm take control
Dancing queen under the lights
We're gonna boogie all night
Boogie all night

[Bridge]

Feel the groove inside your heart
This is where the magic starts

[Outro]
Boogie all night
Boogie all night
